mapper.sql: ewp.id as position_id,ewp.warehouse_id as position_warehouse_id,ewp.warehouse_position_name as position_warehouse_position_name,ewp.data_status as position_data_status,ewp.remark as position_remark,ewp.create_time as position_create_time,ewp.create_user as position_create_user,ewp.update_time as position_update_time,ewp.update_user as position_update_user
mapper.select: select warehouse.*, from ( select ,esc.sub_company_name,esc.sub_company_type from erp_warehouse ew left join erp_sub_company esc on esc.id = ew.sub_company_id where ew.id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ew.data_status = 1 and esc.data_status = 1 ) warehouse left join erp_warehouse_position ewp on ewp.warehouse_id = warehouse.id

select warehouse.*, from ( select ,esc.sub_company_name,esc.sub_company_type from erp_warehouse ew left join erp_sub_company esc on esc.id = ew.sub_company_id where ew.warehouse_no = #{warehouseNo, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ew.data_status = 1 and esc.data_status = 1 ) warehouse left join erp_warehouse_position ewp on ewp.warehouse_id = warehouse.id

select warehouse.*, from ( select ,esc.sub_company_name,esc.sub_company_type from erp_warehouse ew left join erp_sub_company esc on esc.id = ew.sub_company_id where ew.sub_company_id = #{subCompanyId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ew.warehouse_type = #{warehouseType, jdbcType=INTEGER} and ew.data_status = 1 and esc.data_status = 1 ) warehouse left join erp_warehouse_position ewp on ewp.warehouse_id = warehouse.id
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM erp_warehouse WHERE create_time > #{startDate} AND create_time < #{endDate}
